welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villupuram, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Modern Cafeeee
restaurants.description: Modern Cafeeee is a mauritian restaurant located in Villupuram.
restaurants.address: periyathachur (mariyamman kovil street), Villupuram 605651, Tamil Nadu

restaurants.name: Hotel Thalappakattu Biriyani
restaurants.description: Hotel Thalappakattu Biriyani is a south indian restaurant located in Viluppuram.
restaurants.address: Opp New Bus Stand, Viluppuram 605602, Tamil Nadu

restaurants.name: archana restaurant
restaurants.description: archana restaurant is a restaurant located in Villupuram.

restaurants.name: Ponnusamy Hotel
restaurants.description: Ponnusamy Hotel is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Hotel Annamalai Residency
restaurants.description: Hotel Annamalai Residency is a indian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pondicherry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
